In development, I can launch test suites in my IDE, and see them pass 
of fail. When they fail, I can see the "detailled" error message.
For a typical web application, made of servlets, I have a suite for 
the db stuff, one for the resource stuff,.. and one that run them all.

I'd like to be able to launch these suites in the production 
environment, by calling a url, and see them pass, or fail. If they 
fail, I'd like to see the error message(s) in my browser.

Has anything like this already been written?

Alain Ravet
Brussels, Belgium
subject: displaying tests results/errors in a servlet/jsp
